EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-05-16-App-Aware-Infrastructure.Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at {{my.Webinar Title:default=the webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you at the {{my.Webinar Title:default=Webinar}}.
You can watch the webinar on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/true-application-aware-infrastructure/]]>.
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
We hope you enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
